name: Catch & Fight Animals at The Zoo Fighting Games
name_original: Catch & Fight Animals at The Zoo Fighting Games
description:
Catch Me Zoo GO are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Zoo hero nearby. Take aim and throw an Egg… You’ll have to stay alert, or it might get away!

Search far and wide for Safari heroes collection and items
Visit found at interesting places like museums, art installations, historical markers, and monuments, to stock up on Eggs and helpful items.

As you level up, you’ll be able to fight & catch more-powerful Hero & Monster. You can add to your collection by hatching Eggs based on the distances you walk. Help your Hero & Monster evolve by catching many of the same kind.

It’s time to get moving—your real-life adventures await!
